page.title: 16LIVING IN SPENNITHORNE.
page.content: THE MAIN CHANGES I HAVE SEEN IN HARMBY AND SPENNITHORNE IN THE LAST 20 YEARSHAVE BEEN THE INCREASE IN POPULATION AND THE DECLINE IN THE BUS SERVICE.HARMBY NOW HAS TWO BUNGALOW ESTATES WITH MANY PEOPLE RETIRING TO THE AREA.IN SPENNITHORNE MANY BUILDINGSHAVE BEEN CONVERTED TO HOLIDAY ACCOMMODATION. WITH SUCH AN INFREQUENT BUS SERVICE MY LIFE WOULD BE VERY DIFFERENT IF I WAS UNABLE TO DRIVE.I AM ABLE TO TAKE MY CHILDREN TO ACTIVITIES OUTSIDE THE VILLAGE AND GO SHOPPING ETC. WHENEVER I WISH. NON-DRIVERS ARE NOT SO LUCKY. LIVING HERE I HAVE THE PEACE AND QUIETOF THE COUNTRYSIDE WITH PLENTY OF THINGS TAKING PLACE IN THE TWO VILLAGES:YET WE ARE NOT TOO FAR FROM SEVERAL LARGE TOWNS AND THEIR FACILITIES. BY MRS A GAINES (HOUSEWIFE)
